snippet: The authorities said they had broken up what they said was a far-right terrorist group that called itself the Oldschool Society.
abstract: German authorities break up group called Oldschool Society, calling it far-right terrorist group with access to explosives; arrest four members on suspicion of plotting to attack Islamic extremists, mosques and migrant shelters.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said they had broken up what they said was a far-right terrorist group that called itself the Oldschool Society.

headline.main: Germany Arrests 4 It Says Planned Attacks on Muslim Sites
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Germany: 4 Are Accused of Plot Against Muslim Sites
